module.name: ap210_assembly_requirement_allocation
module.name.french: Attribution de spécifications d'assemblage pour l'AP 210
module.keywords: module, assembly, requirement, functional, physical, interface, allocation, model, document, authorization

abstract.p: the representation of assembly requirement allocation. Assembly Requirement Allocation includes the following information: complete functional and physical interface requirements, complete capability to allocate enterprise or external agency requirements to assembly function or physical design, model based requirement description using simulation models and models with assigned parametric data. Supporting data including document, authorization, product identification, external definition, and authorization are included.
abstract.li: Requirements allocated to an assembly view of a product.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of assembly requirement allocation. Assembly Requirement Allocation includes the following information: complete functional and physical interface requirements, complete capability to allocate enterprise or external agency requirements to assembly function or physical design, model based requirement description using simulation models and models with assigned parametric data. Supporting data including document, authorization, product identification, external definition, and authorization are included.

inscope.li: Requirements allocated to an assembly view of a product;
items within the scope of application module Ap210 assembly functional requirements, ISO/TS 10303-1605;
items within the scope of application module Ap210 assembly physical interface requirements, ISO/TS 10303-1607.
